mapper.insert: insert into work_type (emp_id, emp_department, emp_rank, emp_name, work_date_start, work_date_end, work_type,work_content, approver_emp_id) values (#{emp_id},#{emp_department},#{emp_rank}, #{emp_name},#{work_date_start}, #{work_date_end}, #{work_type},#{work_content},#{approver_emp_id})
mapper.select: select count(*) from work_type where emp_department = #{emp_department}
SELECT * FROM work_type WHERE (DATE(CURDATE()) BETWEEN work_date_start AND work_date_end) AND final_approver = #{final_approver}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM time_table WHERE work_date = CURDATE() AND start_time IS NOT null AND end_time is null
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM time_table WHERE work_date = CURDATE() AND night_start_time IS NOT null AND night_end_time is NULL

SELECT sum(cnt) FROM( SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM time_table WHERE work_date = CURDATE() AND total_time IS NOT null AND night_start_time is null UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM time_table WHERE work_date = CURDATE() AND night_total_time IS NOT NULL) time_table
